ContentDocLinkEventLog.name: ContentDocLinkEventLog
ContentDocLinkEventLog.description: Content Document Link events contain sharing information for content documents.

DocumentIdentifier.description: The 15-character ID of the document that’s being shared.

RequestIdentifier.description: The unique ID of a single transaction. A transaction can contain one or more events. Each event in a given transaction has the same REQUEST_ID.

SharedWithObjectIdentifier.description: Who the document was shared with.

SharingOperation.description: The type of sharing operation on the document.

SharingPermission.description: What permissions the document was shared with.

Timestamp.description: The access time of Salesforce services in GMT.

UserIdentifier.description: The 15-character ID of the user who’s using Salesforce services through the UI or the API.
